|brand = Dynex |model = DX-UH227 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/14/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Dynex DX-UH227 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series -->
|usb_ver = 2.0 |conn = Female B |size_class = desktop

|pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = 2004 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 600603101090 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "UH697 VER:1.0" is silkscreened on the board. :This text matches up with the [[SMC SMCUSBH7]], which is pretty much identical in form factor, identical in back port labeling, and identical in LED configuration. The manufacturer of the device (which seems to be [http://www.goodway.com.tw/ia/product3.asp?listid=3&id=4&subid=7&pid=302&typeid=8# '''Good Way'''] [[http://web.archive.org/web/20031123190108/http://www.goodway.com.tw/en/prodimg/manual/UH697.pdf pdf]]) is certainly the same. ::This device is presumed to also use ISP1521BE, which is used by the SMCUSBH7.
The power adapter included with the device may be a '''DVE''' DSA-0131F-05 US 13 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz 0.3A -> 5V 2A).
[[Category:English Documentation]]
